name: Fileshare Platform
description: Fileshare provides a platform that allows anyone to build Over the Top (OTT) services, based on a P2P network technology that disperses, stores, and allows the sharing of files. Fileshare is backed by technology that enhances file downloading and Internet streaming bandwidth using Grid Peer networks. The unique information (DNA) of digital content (video, sound source, image, etc.) is extracted and built into a database, and based on this, comparative identification/ search/ protection/ blocking/ charge method of filtering technology (NFT Token method) is implemented for copyright, holder rights, and interests. Fileshare also offers tech-driven copyright management and distribution services, and a coin with built-in economic incentives through file sharing between users with stable services and numerous contents.
